```{r load_data, echo=FALSE}
df <- svNetFlux %>%
  filter(type == "NEE")%>%
  separate(date, c("year","month", "day"),remove = F) %>%
  separate(timestamp, c("ts_date", "time"), sep=" ") %>%
  mutate(time = substr(time, 1, 5))

lab_Y <- expression(paste("ENE (", mu, mol,m^-2,s^-1,")", sep=""))

mdf <- df %>%
  group_by(ID_camp)%>%
  summarise(netCO2F_sd=sd(netCO2F),netCO2F=mean(netCO2F), date=mean(date))
```


## NEE measurements across field campaign
```{r, echo=FALSE, fig.width=9}
# Observation number
nobs <- paste("N :", as.character(NROW(df)))
# quality criteria on R2
df$colR2 <- ifelse(df$R2 >= 0.8, ">= 0.8", "< 0.8")

flplt(df, lab_Y)+ # /src/report/vis_plot
  geom_point(aes(color=colR2), shape=21, size=4)+
  theme(legend.position=c(.9,.9), legend.key=element_blank())
ggsave("NEE_evolution.pdf", path=savpth)

ggplot(mdf, aes(x=date, y=netCO2F))+
  geom_point(size=3)+
  geom_linerange(aes(x=date, ymin=netCO2F-netCO2F_sd, ymax=netCO2F+netCO2F_sd))+
  labs(y=lab_Y, x="2013-2014")+
  scale_x_date(breaks = date_breaks("2 months"), labels = date_format("%b"))+
  theme_bw()+
  theme(panel.grid.major.x = element_blank(), # DIAPO
        panel.grid.major.y = element_line(size=.05, colour="gray95"), # DIAPO
        panel.grid.minor = element_blank()) # DIAPO)
ggsave("NEE_evolution_avg.pdf", path=savpth, width=7, height=3)
```

## Annual mean differences significance:

```{r}
A <- filter(df, year==2013)
B <- filter(df, year==2014)
t.test(A$netCO2F, B$netCO2F)
```

## Annual mean and standard deviation
```{r, echo=FALSE}
df %>%
  group_by(year) %>%
  summarise(NEE = round(mean(netCO2F, na.rm=T),2), NEE_sd = round(sd(netCO2F, na.rm=T),2))
```
